jumpTo:
jumpTo( n )
    Jumps to a specified slide, where `n` is the nominal slide number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    n: integer
    	Nominal slide number (one-based).

    Examples
    --------
    > jumpTo( 2 )

    See Also
    --------
    next, prev
next:
next()
    Moves the presentation to the next slide or slide fragment.

    Examples
    --------
    > next()

    See Also
    --------
    jumpTo, prev
prev:
prev()
    Moves the presentation to the previous slide or slide fragment.

    Examples
    --------
    > prev()

    See Also
    --------
    jumpTo, next
runSlide:
runSlide()
    Runs slide code.

    Examples
    --------
    > runSlide()

    See Also
    --------
    next, prev
